Text: ERCs for Sale in CalifHello My name is John Poundstone I manage my familys farm in Northern California The attached Excel file details ERCs our family has for sale in Colusa County California Under California law phasing out the burning of rice straw our family was able to certify our emission tonnage We are in an attainment area and if the Rice portion of the credits are sold to a non attainment area EPA phases that portion of our tonnage down to If sold within the area EPA hopefully is not involved and there is no phase down We have been negotiating with Reliant Energy to sell our PM and SOx for use at their proposed mw plant to be built in Colusa County Our PM will meet approximately of their facilitys needs We have been negotiating with a local vegetable oil company for our ROG and NOx I have heard your company has been active in the California market and I wanted to see if your company might have interest in our credits I may be reached at the following phone numbers Mobile will get quickest response Ranch Office Home Office email mailto I look forward to your response Sincerely John Poundstone
